instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Performance Pro' archetype: Efficient, fast, precise.
Use Red (#ff0000) sparingly but boldly for CTAs and critical alerts.
Use Teal (#008080) for healthcare-related positive states (Licensed, Active, Filled).
Dashboard Layout: Use a 'Bento Grid' approach. 4 columns on desktop.
Compliance Section: Use a table with clear red/amber/green indicators for document expiration.
Kanban Board: Ensure columns have distinct background colors (slate-50) to separate them from the white page bg.
Nav: Left Sidebar, fixed width (w-64), dark or light mode based on preference (suggest Light mode with slate-900 text for professionalism).
Charts: Use Recharts. Style them minimal. No 3D charts.
Forms: Use Shadcn Form components. Split long forms into Tabs or Steps (e.g., Candidate Profile).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use flat, clean colors.
Ensure 3:1 contrast for all text. Red on White is tricky - check legibility.
Spacing: Use 'p-6' or 'p-8' for containers. Don't crowd data.
Micro-interactions: Hover states on table rows (bg-slate-50).
Animations: 'transition-all duration-200' on buttons and cards.
